tool_description:
Broadage Basketball API can deliver any type of data for a basketball match, tournament or team; including livescores, play-by-play, boxscore, match statistics & many more. Our Basketball Coverage includes 100+ tournaments from all around the world with in-depth coverage, giving you the opportunity to present the best sports data to users located anywhere.
This is a limited version in RapidApi. Please, click here to start your Free Trial and try the endpoints with live data now!
name: Basketball Data
title: Basketball Data

api_list.name: Tournament Info
api_list.description: Current season, stage structure(divisions,conferences etc.), country and many more information about a tournament.

api_list.name: Tournament List
api_list.description: List of tournaments in your data coverage.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-data.p.rapidapi.com/tournament/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://basketball-data.p.rapidapi.com/tournament/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "basketball-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tournament Teams
api_list.description: List of teams participating in a specific tournament.

api_list.name: Daily Match List-Results
api_list.description:
Daily match list including finished matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of the matches. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}. Data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.

api_list.name: Match Game Leaders
api_list.description:
Live points, rebounds and assists leaderboards of the game for triple-double hunting.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Match Statistics
api_list.description:
Live in match team statistics for each team in a match.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Rebound Leaderboard
api_list.description: Rebounds-per-game leaders of the competition supported with player stats.

api_list.name: Team Schedule
api_list.description: Team fixtures by all the tournaments a team participates.

api_list.name: Assist Leaderboard
api_list.description: Assists-per-game leaders of the competition supported with player stats.

api_list.name: Daily Match List-Live
api_list.description:
Daily match list including live matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of the matches. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}. Data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.

api_list.name: Match Summary
api_list.description:
Basic summary about the match that includes match scores, match status, team names, venue, and round info.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Team Squad
api_list.description: List of players in a team.

optional_parameters.name: tournamentId
optional_parameters.description: The id of the tournament. Tournament id is optional for club teams. However, it is required for national teams.

api_list.name: Daily Match List-All
api_list.description:
Daily match list including scheduled, live and finished matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of the matches. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}.  Data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.

api_list.name: Daily Match List-Scheduled
api_list.description:
Daily match list including scheduled matches.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with date range of today - 7 days.**

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date of the match. The format is {dd/MM/yyyy}. Data can be retrieved for only ± 7 days.

api_list.name: Tournament Standings
api_list.description: Team rankings for a specific competition.

api_list.name: Point Leaderboard
api_list.description: Points-per-game leaders of the competition supported with player stats.

api_list.name: Result Statistics
api_list.description:
Provides the result list of the last 20 matches between the two teams in overall, with home and away filters.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Recent Match List
api_list.description:
Provides the result list of the last 20 matches between the two teams in overall, with home and away filters.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Tournament Fixture
api_list.description: Full match list with quarter, half time and final scores with venue info.

api_list.name: Seasonal Statistics: Quarter Analysis
api_list.description: Provides the seasonal quater analysis and statistics of the team in the tournament.

api_list.name: Seasonal Market Statistics: Points
api_list.description: Provides the seasonal market points statistics of the team in the tournament.

api_list.name: Match Margins
api_list.description: Provides the average match margin statistics of the team in the tournament.

api_list.name: Market Statistics (Points)
api_list.description:
Provides the market points statistics which are “First Quarter Result”, “Highest Scoring Quarter” and also “Ordinary/Half Time Winning Margins” for both two teams against the other teams in the tournament.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Quarter Analysis
api_list.description:
Provides the analyst data for each quarters including Quarter Winning Avereages, Quarter Winning Counts, Quarter Winning Percentages with home team / away team filters.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Seasonal Advanced Team Statistics
api_list.description:
Provides the season-wide advanced team statistics with home team / away team filters.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Under / Over Analysis
api_list.description:
Provides the under/over score analysis and statistics with the home/away team filters.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

P.S.
Full data is available at Under / Over Analysis endpoint but can not be shown in mock response.

api_list.name: Match Boxscore
api_list.description:
Live, detailed team and player statistics.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Match Play by Play
api_list.description:
Live match events with scores.

**The data will return for only -+7 days period, so endpoint can be tested with match that its date is in today +- 7 days. You can choose suitable match from Basketball Match List or Fixture endpoints.**

api_list.name: Seasonal Statistics: Points
api_list.description: Provides the points statistics of the team in the tournament.
